Player - Class in game
Represents a player in the game with various states and behaviors such as moving left and right, idle states, and attacking mechanisms.
Player(World) - Constructor for class game.Player
Constructs a Player object with initial settings.
PlayerController - Class in game
Controls a Player object in response to user inputs from the keyboard and mouse.
PlayerController(Player, float, float) - Constructor for class game.PlayerController
Constructs a PlayerController for the specified player with defined speed and jump impulse.

Portal - Class in game
Represents a portal in a game world, which is a special type of doorway that emits sound when destroyed.
Portal(World) - Constructor for class game.Portal
Constructs a Portal object with a specific appearance and behavior defined by its parent class.
